杯.definition: cup; trophy cup; classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

杯中物.definition: the contents of the cup; (fig.) liquor; wine

杯具.definition: cup; (slang) (pun on 悲劇|悲剧[bei1 ju4], tragedy) so bad; terrible; bummer; fiasco; debacle

杯弓蛇影.definition: lit. to see a bow reflected in a cup as a snake (idiom); fig. unnecessary suspicions; overly fearful

杯水車薪.definition: lit. a cup of water on a burning cart of firewood (idiom); fig. an utterly inadequate measure

杯珓.definition: pair of mussel-shaped objects thrown on the ground for divination purposes

杯盤狼藉.definition: cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party

杯酒解怨.definition: a wine cup dissolves complaints (idiom); a few drinks can ease social interaction

杯酒言歡.definition: a few drinks and a nice conversation (idiom)

杯酒釋兵權.definition: to dismiss military hierarchy using wine cups; cf Song founding Emperor Song Taizu 宋太祖 holds a banquet in 961 and persuades his senior army commanders to go home to their provinces
